snippet: Sierra Leoneans on Sunday celebrated the end of a three-day lockdown aimed at stemming the world's worst ever Ebola epidemic, as authorities claimed the controversial operation had identified dozens of new infections and located scores of bodies....

headline.print_headline: Sierra Leone Wraps Up Three-Day Ebola Lockdown
headline.main: Sierra Leone Wraps Up Three-Day Ebola Lockdown

lead_paragraph: Sierra Leoneans on Sunday celebrated the end of a three-day lockdown aimed at stemming the world's worst ever Ebola epidemic, as authorities claimed the controversial operation had identified dozens of new infections and located scores of bodies.
